Fales Library and Special Collections
Marina Urbach Collection on C Space Gallery
Urbach, Marina
Urbach, Marina
MSS.577
.25 linear feet in 1 half manuscript box
1976-2015 Marina Urbach is New York City-based an artist and curator. This collection consists of materials collected by Urbach related to C Space gallery in New York City in the late 1970s. Materials include exhibition announcement cards and copies of a catalog for the 1976 "Style and Process" exhibition organized by Urbach. Of note is a exhibition announcement for the 1977 "Memory" exhibition at C Space organized by Marcia Tucker in cooperation with the New Museum. Materials are in English. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.
Scope and Contents
This collection consists of materials collected by curator and artist Marina Urbach related to C Space Gallery in New York City. Materials include exhibition announcement cards and copies of a catalog for the 1976 "Style and Process" exhibition organized by Urbach. Of note is a exhibition announcement for the 1977 "Memory" exhibition at C Space organized by Marcia Tucker in cooperation with the New Museum.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. You are free to use materials in the collection in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Marina Urbach in April 2019; the accession number associated with this gift is 2019.037.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Marina Urbach Collection on C Space; MSS 577; box number; folder number or item identifier; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University.
Processing Information
At the time of accessioning materials were rehoused in an archival box and folder, and described on the collection-level with a box and folder list.
Biographical Note
Marina Urbach is New York City-based an artist and curator who oversaw the C Space gallery. In 1976 she organized the exhibition "Style and Process" at the Fine Arts Building.
